message: uwu pick me yuta bitch can get eaten/killed

The real reason of him unable to fight with a sword was because of the stupid eyepatch .Since he only sees with 1 eye, he can't judge the depth or the actual distance between himself and his target to precisely strike his opponent. That's why all predators have 2 eyes infront of their face ( lions, tigers, eagles etc) instead of having then on either sides of the head
